params.description: Language code of language to use.
params.name: code

params.description: Language code of language to use.
params.name: code

params.description: Dictionary or JSON string of language data to use.
params.name: data

params.description: Data to format in locale. Can be in `Number` class or `Date` class.
params.name: data

params.description: Language code of language to use.
params.name: code

params.description: Options to use when formatting. Default: `{}`.
params.name: options

l10n.formatLocale.longDescription: If the `data` parameter is an instance of `Date` and the `time` key in `options` has the value `true`, then the `data` parameter will be formatted as a time.
l10n.formatLocale.shortDescription: Format a data type to be understandable in the specified locale.

return.description: Locale code of user determined from browser.

l10n.getBrowserLocale.shortDescription: Get the user's locale determined from the browser.

params.description: Data that was used in event.
params.name: data

params.description: Result that occurred. Should be `null` if `success` is `false`.
params.name: result

params.description: Whether the event was successful. Default: `true`.
params.name: success

params.description: Date of event in `Date` class type. Default: `new Date()`.
params.name: date

l10n.addToLog.shortDescription: Add event to l10n event log.

params.description: Arguments to include in string. Default: `{}`.
params.name: arguments

params.description: Whether to use locale formatting of arguments. Default: `true`.
params.name: useLocaleFormats
